website_summaries.verdict: A dual zone portable chest freezer that has a capacity of 1.48 cubic feet.
pros: The temperature in each zone of this freezer can be set independently
The unit is capable of running off of a regular household outlet or a 12 volt battery
This model also features a "fast freeze" mode and internal LED lights
cons: There may be issues with packing as units occasionally arrive dented

customer_reviews.title: Gets cold fast and uses little power. Once cold ...
customer_reviews.text: Gets cold fast and uses little power. Once cold it uses negligible amounts of power. I left it running over a weekend on a 400AH 12v battery supply and only voltage only dropped 0.1-0.2 volts
customer_reviews.author: Timo Johann

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fridge/freezer! I have a 400watt solar system with ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fridge/freezer! I have a 400watt solar system with a 200ah agm. This combo does use alot of power when empty. To maximize efficiency load water jugs in any empty space.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: the least durable refrigerator ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we ever owned. The first one failed at 13 months. While it was operating, it was great. This one didn't even make it that far. It didn't function properly from the beginning. Thankfully, Amazon allowed me to return it, but I will NEVER buy a Wynter product again.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Jones

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY FROM WHYNTER. I purchased this Dual Zone Fridge/Freezer to keep in my garage. The product was defective from the moment it arrived and would not respond to changes in the desired temperature. Both zones were below freezing which made the refrigerator side unusable. The company asked me to perform extensive troubleshooting, including removing the control panel, reconnecting loose wires, etc. None of this worked. I asked the company to honor the warranty and replace the defective unit and they have gone silent. Terrible customer service and failure to honor their warranty.
customer_reviews.author: James Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great unfortunately mine was  damaged in shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Great unit, but arrived damaged. Great return policy. Such a nice unit that even with the cosmetic damage, I hate having to send it back. Plenty of storage space and well built. A little heavy and big, but this was the smallest true dual zone unit I could find. I would buy again. Update: If the voltage displayed on the cooler is reading low. Check the voltage at your battery, and check it at the cigarette lighter socket (with your cooler pulling a load.) In my case I was reading 12.8 at the battery, and 11.7 at the cigarette lighter socket. I added a heavier gauge wire and checked my ammeter shunt connections.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: Great, but...
customer_reviews.text: For those of us that pull an RV and keep this on the bed of the truck, know that a F150 2020 Platinum will produce enough DC for the 7 way connector to the RV but not enough to also run this fridge, so as the battery falls below a certain level, as a protection, the fridge turns itself off (I guess not to drain the battery). The temperature in the fridge/freezer goes up pretty quickly although I have mine wrapped in isolating material to help keep it cool.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo R. Vitaver

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend. No customer support.
customer_reviews.text: The unit has failed after two years displaying a code of 5C. I've tried to contact Whynter multiple times by phone and email but have not received any response.
customer_reviews.author: Gundam1s

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Finished Product Runs Constantly
customer_reviews.text: I just received my refrigerator and I’ve already had to contact the company because they don’t put the latch in the middle of the big door so the seal is not even. All of this money spent on refrigerator and the quality is so far very suspect and doors are not even. Update on review: this refrigerator is pure garbage poorly insulated runs every 20 minutes on every setting in 75 degree weather can’t imagine how bad it will perform once I am warmer temperatures. I totally got burned on a horrible product and I made a custom spot for this piece of garbage on my boat.
customer_reviews.author: Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: WHYNTER IS A TRASH COMPANY
customer_reviews.text: not working with less than a year of use, support from the company is garbage. do not buy. buy Engel or Dometic, whynter is a terrible company. no product support and low quality product. DO NOT BUY WHYNTER PRODUCTS.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Fehler

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best thing I have purchased. Keeps the beverages cold and the ice frozen. Installed on My sailboat as an icebox replacement. perfectly sized low power consumption. I can run all day without exhausting the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Rasman

customer_reviews.title: My unit sucked.
customer_reviews.text: So I used this on a week long trip through the rockeys. The unit would not cool on the 12 v plug. It would slowly raise the temp. On the other hand it worked great on 110.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected, take out the baskets they make the space smaller. Nothing fits well like pop cans or milk jugs. Received with dings and dents from shipping. Is noisier than expected. The doors and construction are substandard. Would not recomend.
customer_reviews.author: No face boy

customer_reviews.title: Overall its a really nice addition to my van
customer_reviews.text: it works as expected. I read the reviews that the top doors could be a little more insulated this is true but I don't see that as a problem. However I would say that the package was slightly damaged in shipping but doesn't affect its performance so I will keep it since its really heavy and I don't want to send it back. Overall its a really nice addition to my van.
customer_reviews.author: Moss C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have is the weight, wish it was a little lighter. We love using it for camping. We were able to sit by the fire and eat ice cream. We camped for 3 nights and it had a very low drain on my truck battery but I have to admit I had just installed a new battery so not sure how it would affect an older battery. We also bought the cover and it worked well, it kept in the cold cause you could feel the lid was really cold and believe it would have run more without the cover.
customer_reviews.author: David Firebaugh

customer_reviews.title: low power consumption
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Used for dry camping, I have solar and lithium batteries. Throw water bottles in with other frozen items in the evening and they are frozen ready to go in the morning. Excellent for ice cream, cant even keep ice cream in gas rv fridge. Clamps on lids are great to keep closed when transporting. The only issue I can see is the voltage drops a lot from battery to fridge probably from the long 12v cord, a heaver gauge wire would help, fridge shuts off at low voltage when the batteries are not that low.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice fridge for the money. Few issues but I can live with them.
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a great refrigerator so far. The larger compartment seems to work better as the freezer as it holds the temperature steadier than the small compartment. I wish the larger side basket would fit a 1 gallon crystal geyser water jug but it will fit if you remove the basket but that kinda defeats the purpose. Would I buy this refrigerator again? Absolutely, but I also bought the 5 year extended warranty just to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: amazing. I love that there are two zones that ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge! But, amazing. I love that there are two zones that you can change from fridge to freezer if you want. I also love the shape of it. Most portable units are rounded and irregular, this thing is a box. It just means you get the most space thats possible.
customer_reviews.author: Chaunceylock

customer_reviews.title: 2nd purchase of this exact model
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd. Purchase of this refrigerator model. The price has remained consistent. It is our hope that this one will be as good if not better than the last one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saves on ice
customer_reviews.text: Been using for 2 months and is working great. I think it’s priced too high.
customer_reviews.author: kyironrider

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but worth the money for anyone spending a lot of time in a camper van.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Rincon 11

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. I have no complaints about it. I am a truck driver and I decided to remove my passenger seat and put this in place of it. Does everything I expected to do. However. If you decide to order this item from Amazon I would call them directly and ask them to send it as fragile freight. The first One I received in the mail came in damage with a bunch of dents all over it. Had to ask Amazon to return it and send me another one.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Distrito

customer_reviews.title: had a loose wire inside on the DC side. ...
customer_reviews.text: had a loose wire inside on the DC side. Support replied with a fix. Makes me question it's durability for travel but so far it's worked.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for van life!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent excellent excellent product. Mine is for van use, hooked up to a solar system and is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very pleased with product
customer_reviews.text: used it while traveling to florida,small side on freezer at 20 degrees,large side as refrig. at 40 degrees. worked as advertised, very pleased with product. would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: robert fleetwood

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase. I looked over all the different brands and picked this one. Glad I did. It has worked great. Keeps drinks cold and bag of ice and ice cream frozen. Very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for damage!
customer_reviews.text: Big dent in the back near rear vent. I was disappointed in the damage because I bought three items and two so far are dented.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery problem
customer_reviews.text: Love my freezer but have had a problem with my cord plugging into my pickup on the battery .It doesn't work. Has anyone had this problem? Whynter is emailing me regarding what to do.
customer_reviews.author: Judi A. Reinke

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is incredible. Installed it into the tiny house. Consumes very little (solar power) electricity. Provides a battery status and temp each compartment. Doesn't lose a lot of 'cool' due to the top door design. Goes from 90 deg to below zero in no time at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Marino

customer_reviews.title: I love that it has separate doors for each compartment
customer_reviews.text: I love that it has separate doors for each compartment. .I love what it is designed to do. I don't like that I had to buy one so big for separate doors.. and I don't like that mine is not working on 12v. So far I am very dissatisfied, extremely disappointed... I will never recommend this product to anyone...
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great..when it works
customer_reviews.text: This product is great when it works. I have had 2 of these and honestly they work for about a year to a year and a half then they quit.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: well built.
customer_reviews.text: Put in my truck nice and reliable wort the money. Has frig and separate freezer compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Reese

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: We like the size of each side; perfect for a long weekend to a week of camping.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: They enjoy sending the incorrect model
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like receiving the wrong model when u need the right one
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Was damaged and not working upon arrival, but Amazon reps were very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Very high build quality
customer_reviews.text: Look at the dimensions closely it is exactly the size it says and it is big.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Porter

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: heavy to lug around but great so far. I bought a small mover's dolly for $20 to sit it on so I can roll it around. keeps the temp great using AC power, and just as great using DC- frozen stuff stays solid! get the transit bag too- it's great if you're going to be using outdoors in hot weather.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Outten

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and bulky but does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with surface damage on the compressor corner. The outer grilled cage was slightly dented in but has no effect on the refrigerator/freezer's operation. I shipped this to Maui and was not about to send it back just for that reason. The unit needs a few minutes to chill down but works beautifully while in operation. I use this exclusively in my vehicle and my only complaint is that I wish they would have supplied a longer power extension cord. While adjusting for ventilation, it will take up lots of room in your trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha D. Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Portable Fridge/Freezer, love it.
customer_reviews.text: love this...went camping, no more ice to purchase. Kept everything at temperature, used small side for a freezer. Everyday, I would switch out frozen "blue" ice from the freezer to my regular ice chest to keep veggies cool.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret F.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Works great in the house, van or truck. Cools just as effectively as my kitchen refrigerator, and maintains the selected temperature. Start it up, and it is ready to use in about 30 minutes. It's great to be riding down the road, enjoying a cone of ice cream without having to stop and purchase it. Wish it was a few pounds lighter, but still worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: traveler

customer_reviews.title: Ugh 3 months I've had been extremely happy until now
customer_reviews.text: Ugh 3 months I've had been extremely happy until now. Just filled it up with 150 worth of groceries and three hours later it was at 60 degrees. Displays were all working but compressor wasn't kicking on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Although inconvienent, my problem was corrected
customer_reviews.text: I can not give a prooer review at this time, as mine was damages upon reciept. I will be giving a proper review after I have used it for a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Whynter FM-62DZ
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, cools/freezes quickly, decent amount of room. Haven't yet tested using DC but will update later after I have done so.
customer_reviews.author: Ridgemeister

customer_reviews.title: If I did it all over again I buy an Australian one or design it to be insulated better wear it sits
customer_reviews.text: I have now used this unit for over a month straight on a overland off road trip. It works. It does use a lot more power then my othet higher quality Australian fridge foes. Also on days of ruff terrain the compressor willl stop turning on. I have to unplug it and plug it back in to get it functioning right. I can feel the cold escaping through the lid and sides. I am about to make a Styrofoam jacket for it to help with the power usage and so the compressors run less. If I did it all over again I buy an Australian one or design it to be insulated better wear it sits.
customer_reviews.author: D. Metz

customer_reviews.title: Knocked Around But Still Working Great
customer_reviews.text: Has been used regularly now for 2 years. It has a few dings and dents, but it still runs great. Very impressive how it can freeze one section and keep the other a refrigerator. I operate it on a 12V photovoltaic system at our cabin. It is rather heavy - especially when loaded, but I guess making it robust enough to stand up to getting knocked around takes some substantial materials. The handles broke so I replaced them with rope loops. They cannot handle the weight of a loaded fridge getting moved around routinely. Interior light is a nice feature. Be sure you have heavy wiring as voltage drop on a 12V system can be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: John Loud

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying benefits
customer_reviews.text: Nice buy. Running continuously about 24 months, as primary refrigerator no problems. Fits 2 gallon milk without basket upright on large side. Run times are low, temperature stability good. Led lights helpful. Slight smell, half a day most new products do.great energy-efficient compared to previous unit. good product, could never recommend a thermal-electric after using this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a great unit. I installed it in my van and it has been running constantly on 12v for over three months. Powered by batteries and a solar panel. I use the small compartment as a freezer set at 0 deg f and large compartment set at 37 deg f.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever! Great quality and construction. Building my own slide took some time but it works great in the back of a wrangler. Perfect fit! Kept ice for drinks and food frozen in the small compartment. Food stayed perfectly chilled in the refrigerator side. Very quiet. I do suggest buying the cover. I had to upgrade the power wiring to the rear of the Jeep and used the ARB wiring kit. I just replaced the ARB socket in the molding with a heavy duty standard socket. Just after buying it our home refrigerator packed up and we used this one in our home for about a week and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Anton van Heerden

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: After many weeks of research I decided to take the risk. Only used a few times so time will tell. Arrived well boxed and in perfect condition. Overall so far I am very happy. Keeps thing cold and frozen in the DYI camper. Hear a bit of noise but not enough to be problematic. I did find that the wire gauge provided was marginal at best. There was 1-2 volt drop when the fridge was running. Hard wired with heavier gauge, about 8ft, and everything is happy.
customer_reviews.author: JS Machine

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Love that it does both or either fridge/freezer
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Love that it does both or either fridge/freezer. Low power draw and super quiet. Had to check to make sure it was still on it was so quiet. We use it for overlanding and are pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: yellow boat

customer_reviews.title: Packaging and weight make the product a bit unwieldy but ...
customer_reviews.text: Packaging and weight make the product a bit unwieldy but I'd rather struggle and have an undamaged product than a more manageable pile of junk. Gets very cold very quickly. Motor surprisingly quiet. No unpleasant odor as stated in previous reviews. It IS all of the 60 pounds advetised. Would not make a suitable vehicle cooler for road trips but is ideal for my needs as a freezer/refrigerator at a base camp.
customer_reviews.author: The AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Good refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Good refrigerator if you boondock you need solar as it will drain your battery. Works fine if you driving without solar. The cover could be better one of the seams came apart within first week.
customer_reviews.author: jc1179

customer_reviews.title: Been around the country in small RV(rough riding) works perfect. One 12v deep cycle will last up to ...
customer_reviews.text: rugged unit. Been around the country in small RV(rough riding) works perfect. One 12v deep cycle will last up to 7 hours with no charge. when you pull into campground, switching from 12v to 110v is a snap. Make sure you have plenty of upper swing room for doors.
customer_reviews.author: Den

customer_reviews.title: Great 12v fridge.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this fridge. Reaches the temperatures set for the fridge and freezer amazingly fast. Power usage barely touches the solar power system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I've bought all year!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS APPLIANCE!!!! We are moving to Chicago soon and our refrigerator had to be shipped!!! This item fits in my, "don't know what I would of done without it list!!!" Works fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Now this baby does its job
customer_reviews.text: It's a little pricey but if you want the control of refrigerator and freezer sizes and the ability to have both at the same time this little cooler is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Ken K

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic device! I love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic device! I love it. Using it in my truck for long haul trips. It has a special mode I use for the night when it consumes very little energy. I can set desirable temperatures in every compartment, it's easy to clean, very well insulated. Must have for a trucker!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Silver

customer_reviews.title: Excellent portable unit
customer_reviews.text: This portable unit is excellent and does fantastic job of cooling. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: charles c hanson,jr

customer_reviews.title: Rad fridge
customer_reviews.text: I build tinyhouses and adventure vans and have used this fridge multiple times in projects. Also, I own one myself. Has worked flawlessly for well over a year and a half
customer_reviews.author: seanvaron

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and cheaper than ARB fridge. Off roading just got better
customer_reviews.text: Yeah we wanted an ARB fridge for our kick ass Jeep expeditions, but damn that shizzle is expensive! We wanna be cool like our other friends and have cold drinks on the trail and now we can! Currently were using this in our living room plugged into the outlet. Has a very quiet "hum" to it but not really loud. keeps frozen frozen keeps cold cold. So glad we got this and saved a lot of money too! This is a really well made product and I think it will last a long time! Get it now and make your off roading experience to the next level.
customer_reviews.author: C and L

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I drew a short straw
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these from different sources. The first one worked well except for the beeping every three seconds. All attempts to correct it were unsuccessful. The second one was very quiet, and worked well on AC. However the DC portion would not work at all. Would not cool down at all on DC. THE control panel worked, however the temp reading always showed ambient temp. I really wanted this to work for us.
customer_reviews.author: C Emerson

customer_reviews.title: all of which I was not happy about but would have lived with if the unit ...
customer_reviews.text: unit came dented on corner edge of large compartment, bottom corner slightly dented & scratched, all of which I was not happy about but would have lived with if the unit actually worked. Plugged it in, display panel and controls come on and appear to be working, but the compressor never kicks on, the unit never cooled. I don't have much confidence in an a unit that is a lemon right out of the box. I have the feeling I am about teh 10th customer to have this exact same unity shipped to them only to return it, you get the feeling that they are just looking for someone to finally take it, NO THANKS!
customer_reviews.author: Steve M.

customer_reviews.title: DUEL ZONE ONLY HAS 1 LCD TEMP GAUGE, AND ...
customer_reviews.text: DUEL ZONE ONLY HAS 1 LCD TEMP GAUGE, AND ONLY ONE ZONE? CANT FIGURE OUT HOW TO SEPARATE TOE TWO, I SET ONE AND IT WAS ON BOTH. INSTRUCTIONS VERY VAGUE.
customer_reviews.author: Wildwings

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Barely lasted a year.. bought last year in July 2016, went out July 2017. I do not recommend this product. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Schedule

product_meta.title: Whynter 62 Quart Dual Zone Portable Fridge, AC 110V/ DC 12V True Freezer for Car, Home, Camping, RV-8°F to 50°F, One Size, Gray
product_meta.description: Style Name:FridgeThis Whynter dual zone portable refrigerator/freezer offers premium quality and innovative design for your frozen and refrigerated needs. With two separately controlled temperature zones, you can set either zone as a freezer and the other as a refrigerator or at any temperature to meet your specific requirements. All you need is either a standard household 110 volt outlet or a 12 volt power source such as an automotive battery. The internal LED lights allow for easier, more convenient access in low-light conditions. Whether on a day trip or major expedition, you can easily keep your food and beverages chilled, or frozen with this bench top freezer. Whynter portable freezers should not to be confused with less effective 12 volt novelty and beverage type "Coolers", The Whynter portable refrigerator/freezer is a true freezer/refrigerator which cools to between -8°F to 50°F. A cost effective and mobile solution for your recreational and critical freezing requirements.
feature_bullets: 62 quarts or 91 cans (12fl oz.) capacity; Adjustable temperature range: -8°F to 50°F; LED temperature display; “Fast freeze” mode rapidly cools to -8°F

Car, RV and home use; operates as a refrigerator or freezer; work with 12/24V DC and 110V AC power; voltage power AC (115V/ 60Hz – 0. 8a) or DC (12V/24V – 4. 5a /2. 5a Car lighter socket); unit can be plugged in with both AC power and the DC power at the same time. If both AC and DC are plugged in at the same time, then the unit will primarily operate on AC. If the AC power source fails, DC will become primary source of power supply.
8-Feet AC power cord and 10-feet DC power cord; two removable wire baskets; insulated lid and walls; ETL approved
Power low indicator; functions even when tilted 30°; tough and solid outer powder coated steel housing; drain plug for easy cleaning; Stainless steel side handles
Wattage: 75 watts. Net Weight: 57 lb. Internal dimensions: big zone: 13″ W x 12. 5″L x 15. 5″ H including a compressor step with 7″ W x 8″ H; Small zone: 8″ W x 12. 5″L x 15. 5″ H; 45. 00 DBA

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars127 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
